description: This header file declares internal API functions for managing an object array of pointers, including size management, element access, insertion, removal, and search functionalities within the Object Array component of a larger system.

methods.name: AnscPtrArrayGetSize
methods.description: Retrieves the size of the pointer array.

methods.name: AnscPtrArraySetSize
methods.description: Sets the size of the pointer array, with options to specify growth behavior.

methods.name: AnscPtrArrayRemoveAll
methods.description: Removes all elements from the array.

methods.name: AnscPtrArrayGetAt
methods.description: Gets the element at a specified index.

methods.name: AnscPtrArraySetAt
methods.description: Sets the element at a specified index.

methods.name: AnscPtrArrayInsertAt
methods.description: Inserts an element, or count of elements, at a specified index.

methods.name: AnscPtrArrayRemoveAt
methods.description: Removes a specified number of elements starting from a given index.

methods.name: AnscPtrArrayAdd
methods.description: Adds an element to the end of the array.

methods.name: AnscPtrArrayEnlargeStorage
methods.description: Enlarges the storage capacity of the array.

methods.name: AnscPtrArrayFind
methods.description: Finds an element in the array and returns its index or -1 if not found.
